question: A particle of specific charge π C/kg is projected from the origin towards positive x-axis with the velocity 10 ms⁻¹ in a uniform magnetic field B = -2k T. The velocity v of particle after time 1/12 s will be (in ms⁻¹)
explanation: Angular frequency ω = qB/m = π × 2 = 2π rad/s.
Velocity vector rotates 30° towards y-axis (Force q(v×B) is +y).
